rules_text:
Flying
When Cerulean Curtain Treasurer enters the battlefield, audition for blue, then audition for blue again. [i](To audition for blue, create a 1/1 Construct Actor creature token or a blue Role Aura on a creature you control. The blue Roles are a 2/2 Wizard with prowess and a 2/1 Warlock with flying.)[/i]
